name: com.appalachia.unity3d.auto-save
description: Editor-only auto-save functionality for Unity3D projects, with configurable preferences.

scripts.preversion:
sed "s|## Unreleased|## Unreleased 

##$npm_package_version
`git log --oneline $(git describe --abbrev=0 $(git describe --abbrev=0)^)..HEAD`|g" CHANGELOG.md
